executive_summary: The `PROJECT_elements` project aims to analyze codebases and provide architectural insights. The architecture follows a layered approach with a core engine (`standard-model-of-code`), AI support (`context-management`), and archival storage (`archive`).

patterns.name: Layered Architecture
patterns.evidence: The project structure divides functionality into three layers: `standard-model-of-code` (the core engine), `context-management` (AI support), and `archive` (cold storage).

refactoring_plan.action: Create interfaces for core components in `standard-model-of-code`.
refactoring_plan.benefit: Improves testability and allows for easier swapping of implementations in the future.

refactoring_plan.action: Define clear API boundaries between the `standard-model-of-code` and `context-management` modules.
refactoring_plan.benefit: Reduces coupling and allows for independent evolution of these modules.

refactoring_plan.action: Implement health checks and monitoring for the `Collider` engine.
refactoring_plan.benefit: Enhances operational stability and allows for proactive detection of issues.
